search.query: sourcetype=cf:valuemetric name=CapacityRemainingMemory | eval valueGB=round(case(unit=="MiB", value/1024, unit=="KiB", value/(1024*1024), unit=="GiB", value),2) | stats min(valueGB) as mem by jobInstance | sort 20 mem | eval health=case(mem<$mem_threshold$, "⚠", 1==1, "✓") | rename mem as "Available Memory (GB)", jobInstance as "Job Instance", health as "Health"
